participant_1.background:
I like to listen to upbeat music to get pumped up before I race my go kart.
I am an only child and I am excited to start a new chapter in my life at college.
I like to dye my hair pink because it's a fun and playful color that matches my personality.
I once got a paper cut on my finger while delivering a shipment to a university.
I'm not really one for relationships, but my dog has been with me for 10 years.

participant_2.background:
I was a personal chef before I started my own meatloaf catering business.
i like to stay fit.
I have a dog and a cat, both of whom are very well-behaved.
I like my job, but I don't have a lot of family support.
I am short for my age, but I am strong and fit.

content.text: Hi, my name is [name], and I'm a first-year student at [university name]. I'm really excited to start this new chapter in my life!
Hi, [name], I'm [name]. I'm a second-year student here at [university name]. It's nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too! What's your major?
I'm a business major, but I'm thinking about switching to culinary arts.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to be a chef.
Really? That's awesome! What's your favorite kind of food to cook?
I love to cook all kinds of food, but my favorite is probably Italian food.
Italian food is delicious! I love pasta.
Me too! I used to work as a personal chef, and I made a lot of pasta dishes.
That's awesome! I'm sure you were a great chef.
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
So, what are you most excited about for college?
I'm really excited to meet new people and learn new things. I'm also excited to be a part of the [university name] community.
Those are all great things to be excited about! I'm sure you're going to have a great time here.
